summary: MY GRANDSON WENT TO GET OUT OF THE PASSENGER FRONT SIDE OF CAR.  IT WOULD NOT UNLOCK.  HE HAD TO CLIMB OVER TO THE DRIVER SEAT TO GET OUT.  THE NEXT DAY I WENT TO OPEN THE TRUNK AND IT WAS LOCK.  I DO A LOT OF PICKING UP OF MY GRANDCHILDREN AND I'M AFRAID THAT THEY WILL GET STUCK IN THE EVENT OF AN ACCIDENT.  WHAT A SHAME TO HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT THIS AND THE COST I WILL HAVE TO INCUR.  *TR
